## Learning Objectives

-	Develop comprehensive understanding of the scientific foundation, economic rationale, systems complexity, and policy implications of climate change, energy transition, and human society;  
-	Gain a system understanding of the energy root of climate challenges, and the technology, economic, societal, behavioral transformation needed to enable an energy transition;  
-	Get introduced to major analytical concepts and case studies in energy and climate systems and policy analysis;  
-	Develop basic analytical skills to understand and contribute to effective policy discussion and debate.
